column1: Uchi////Exactly five years later we decided to come to the restaurant for a second time. This place should have shut down a long time ago with competitors like KUU
column2: Nobu and Roka Akor I don't understand why people keep coming here. Food was bla
column3: service was stinky literally our waiter stank
column6: wait times are over 30 mins per order and the place is so freaking loud you'd think you were at a club! Will not be coming back...
